metadata.dc:author: Angulo, J C
Zubiaur, C
Flores, N
López, J I
metadata.dc:description: Presentation of one case of a 61-year old male with a non-Hodgkin lymphoma, where a renal cell adenocarcinoma was unexpectedly discovered during and extension study. Review of the pathogenic significance of such association in the light of the various explicative hypothesis of this concurrence.
metadata.dc:title: Carcinoma renal y linfoma no-Hodgkin. Nota clínica.
[Renal carcinoma and non-Hodgkin's lymphoma. A clinical report].
